sections.heading: for payments.A tribunal of this state shall credit amounts collected for a particular period pursuant to any child support order against the amounts owed for the same period under any other child support order for support of the same child issued by a tribunal of this state, another state, or a fore
sections.text: for payments.A tribunal of this state shall credit amounts collected for a particular period pursuant to any child support order against the amounts owed for the same period under any other child support order for support of the same child issued by a tribunal of this state, another state, or a foreign country.SourceLaws 1993, LB 500, ยง 13;Laws 2003, LB 148, ยง 52;Laws 2015, LB415, ยง 12.
